    1. Prepare 2. Estimate

    Function reference

    Prepare data

    Function to prepare data in format required for estimation procedure

    data.prep()
    Prepare data

    Estimate model

    Function to estimate a Bayesian case-control model.

    fit()
    Function to estimate a Bayesian case-control model.

    Run simulations

    Function to simulate data from a relevant data generating process (DGP)

    dgf()
    Simulate data generating process

    Shapefile data

    Shapefile data for dgf() function and main case-control examples.

    scotland
    Shapefile data for dgf() function: scotland
    pennLC
    Shapefile data for dgf() function: Penn
    NYleukemia
    Shapefile data for dgf() function: New York
    shape_egypt
    Shapefile data for Egypt

    Case-control data

    Example case-control data.

    survey_egypt
    Case-control data for Egypt ISIS cases and controls
    denom_mena
    Denominator data for MENA countries
    data.list
    Formatted shape and case-control data for Egypt ISIS cases and controls
    mon_egypt
    Monitor object from rstan::mon() of class "simsummary" "data.frame"

    Helper functions

    Helper functions to check graph connected

    testconnected()
    Test graph connected
    isdisconnected()
    Check graph disconnected
